__e: The explanation is that a writer of mystery novels lives in this house.
If he is here, then I want you to knock it offabout seeing a man in black and all that rot... because, love, the dead don't walk around, except in very bad paperback novels.
Yeah. but I don't think I've ever encountered one for real before.
I just like mystery novels, he was here for a while, we had a laugh, I gave him a couple of my books and he gave me his.
If he is here, then I want you to knock it offabout seeing a man in black and all that rot... because, love, the dead don't walk around, except in very bad paperback novels.
Yeah. but I don't think I've ever encountered one for real before.
Well, you see, to be honest, I've never read one of your novels, and I'd never thought I wanted to read one, but...
When I was a little girl, I used to think it was like that for everyone. It was only when I started to read novels that I realised it was not.
Love-at-first-sight happens only in novels and films. Not in real life
